state.stdin: docker save pipelight/doc:production | ssh -o TCPKeepAlive=no -C linode "docker load"
ssh -o TCPKeepAlive=no -C linode "docker container stop production.doc.pipelight.dev && docker container rm production.doc.pipelight.dev"
ssh -o TCPKeepAlive=no -C linode "docker run  --detach  --publish 127.0.0.1:9080:80  --name production.doc.pipelight.dev  pipelight/doc:production"
ssh -o TCPKeepAlive=no -C linode "sudo systemctl restart nginx"
